topic.title: Jews are fantastically inbred
topic.body:
Scientific evidence: Jews fantastically inbred
http://jewlicious.com/2006/01/science-reveals-jews-fantastically-inbred/
Genetic diseases affecting Ashkenazi Jews
http://forward.com/culture/181591/genetic-diseases-affecting-ashkenazi-jews/
40% of all Jews descended from only 4 woman.
Is incest good for the Jews. Some Jews say YES.
